Package com.ibm.mqtt

The API is defined by interface IMqttClient and implemented by MqttClient.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IMqttClient WebSphere MQ Telemetry Transport Java Classes
MqttAdvancedCallback This interface class defines the methods that will be called if the advanced callback mechanism is implemented.
MqttPersistence MqttPersistence This interface defines the methods that must be implemented to form a persistence mechanism for the WMQtt protocol.
MqttSimpleCallback This interface class defines the methods that will be called if the simple callback mechanism is implemented.
 

Class Summary
MqttClient The MqttClient Java class provides an API for the WebSphere MQ Telemetry Transport.
 

Exception Summary
MqttBrokerUnavailableException This Exception indicates that the broker is busy.
MqttException This is an exception that may be used to report MQTT specific exceptions.
MqttNotConnectedException This exception is thrown to indicate that an operation is being attempted whilst the client is in a disconnected state.
MqttPersistenceException This exception should be thrown by the implementor of the persistence interface if there is a problem reading or writing persistent data.
 

Package com.ibm.mqtt Description

The API is defined by interface IMqttClient and implemented by MqttClient.

To create an instance of a MqttClient use the static method MqttClient.createMqttClient(..).
The MqttClient constructors are also exposed for backwards compatibility.
